name: exchange
description:
ReactCurrencyConverter

This is a Currency Converter in React.

It uses api to get all the needed values. Currently it uses the free api from exchangeratesapi.io

App has two components: Converter and Lists. Their style is mostly done with css, except the select tags, their style is done with react-select so it located within the component directory.

For the proper functioning of the app use these dependencies:

  • "chroma-js": "^2.0.4",
  • "gh-pages": "^2.1.1",
  • "react": "^16.9.0",
  • "react-dom": "^16.9.0",
  • "react-scripts": "0.9.5",
  • "react-select": "^3.0.4"
